result.title: Blog #0 [My first week]
result.content:
Hi there, i'm Jo√£o and i'm from Brazil.

I was thinking and i saw many people asking target's and red's things like: How to become a div1? or How to become red? And all the answers is practice more, try problems hard for you...

So i'll try to do a blog and in each chapter i'll put problems that i liked, nice things that i learned and obviously my trainning week.

Now i'll try to explain what i'm going to do this week, starting from now i'll solve at least 3 problems per day from codeforces, the problems will be from the page 8 of the problemset decreased by solved and every saturday i'll do a 5 hours contest with my friends of the university.

I know that i'm not good on competitive programming but i want to prove that it's not impossible to be a red or a good contestant. If you want to participate of this journey come with me and let's have fun.

I hope you enjoy it. If you like my idea please upvote and comment what would be nice.

IF YOU HAVE SOME TIP PLEASE COMMENT.

UPD: If you want to participate of this journey please send a message with your skype or facebook, it'll be interesting a group with people helping others.

Sorry for my bad english.
